attributes.action: Undertake another EU referendum based on factual information
attributes.additional_details:
In addition, it has not been made clear what negotiations the leave party were likely to undertake and therefore it is likely that what people have voted for they won't get i.e restriction on people borders.

Public admittance that stating funds would be redistributed to the NHS from the EU was a mistake (Nigel Farrage). The leave party based a campaign on this matter but could never fulfill the statement and therefore mislead voters..
attributes.background: The leave party have publicly admitted that they have made mistakes in providing information to voters in the EU referendum in June. Voters have therefore made votes based on incorrect and/or misleading information.
